ygData.subject: RE: Hate List + hand-to-hand + Brass + fun with slaves  + where to sho p  next
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you go in the tunnel between north ro and east commons to the room with the shady swashbuckler, you can go into the very back corner, put on your horn,
ygData.messageBody:
> I have received numerous tells from other bards asking me how
> I got my brass
> skill up. Some of them have heard or thought of going to
> Arena to play DDD
> overnight, some have not.

If you go in the tunnel between north ro and east commons to the room with
the shady swashbuckler, you can go into the very back corner, put on your
horn, and start DDD. go to bed and wake up maxxed. worked for me at least.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 14 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
